title: CSS Fundamentals for Visually Appealing Web
description: In this lab, we will explore the fundamentals of CSS (Cascading Style Sheets) programming. This lab will cover the basics of CSS syntax, selectors, properties, and values. By the end of this lab, you will have a solid foundation in CSS programming and be able to create visually appealing web pages.
